# ApiTransferBankGetResponseDto

Bank account name

**Properties**

| Name | Type   | Required | Description                                |
| :--- | :----- | :------- | :----------------------------------------- |
| ispb | String | ❌       | Identifier in the Brazilian Payment System |
| code | String | ❌       | Bank clearing code in the banking system   |
| name | String | ❌       | Bank name                                  |
